  • Uses of HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions in org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.io.hpo

    Methods in org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.io.hpo that return HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions
    HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions.defaultOmim()
    Get HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions for instructing the HpoDiseaseLoader to load DiseaseDatabase.OMIM diseases, to try to salvage the suspicious frequencies of negated terms, and to assume a cohort size corresponding to DEFAULT_COHORT_SIZE.
    static HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions
    HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions.defaultOptions()
    Get HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions where: DiseaseDatabase.OMIM, DiseaseDatabase.ORPHANET, and DiseaseDatabase.DECIPHER diseases will be loaded suspicious frequencies of negated terms will be salvaged, if possible, and a cohort is assumed to include DEFAULT_COHORT_SIZE members by default
    static HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions
    HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions.of(Set<DiseaseDatabase> databasePrefixes)
    Get HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions for instructing the HpoDiseaseLoader to load diseases with given databasePrefixes, to try to salvage the suspicious frequencies of negated terms, and to assume a cohort size corresponding to DEFAULT_COHORT_SIZE.
    static HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions
    HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions.of(Set<DiseaseDatabase> databasePrefixes, boolean salvageNegatedFrequencies, int cohortSize)
    Create HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions for parameterizing the disease loading by HpoDiseaseLoader.
